original_title: Joshua the Ventriloquist: Fleecing the Family
overview: Ventriloquist Joshua Lackey and his pint-sized partners riff on marriage, parenthood, and how easy it is to go from being a magician to an exotic dancer due to miscommunication. This original performance reminds us what it means to be fleecing the family.
title: Joshua the Ventriloquist: Fleecing the Family
